__e: Too bad we did not know. What we seem now fools.
I wieh we could have brought him with us.
- It was perfect... and I wish you could have been there with me.
Hardly. I'd just like to see you get through a meal without calling her or anyone else.
I wish we could get back the time that was stolen from us.
I wish we were wrong... but we're not.
I wish we could get back the time that was stolen from us.
Hardly. I'd just like to see you get through a meal without calling her or anyone else.
I wish I could stay home and read, but my job, it's like, you know?
I wish I could say it's possible. I just, I don't know if it is right now.
Wish I could stay and chat, but I have some friends to save.
I wish I'd said "I love you." You did, Dad.
I wish I had known three years ago, so mother had been told.
I wish I'd met you sooner... so you could have known him.
Wish I could stay and chat, but I have some friends to save.
I wish I could say it's possible. I just, I don't know if it is right now.
I wish I had known three years ago, so mother had been told.
Daddy, I wish you could watch us work.
If you could just not be so difficult...
I wish you would tell him, because I can't make any sense out of it.
I wish you hadn't got in the car with that girl.
You may not be the only intuitive one here.
-I wish you could hold me now.
You should've been the one that was killed. - You, not Mom!
I wish they called it something else, but that's what they told me to say.
If it were done when 'tis done, then 'twere well it were done quickly.
Wish they could stay that age forever, right?
I wish they were all dead and we were, too.
But I'd rather he had a house.
I like your friend. But I wish he wouldn't do this.
I don't know. I just wish he would get his life together.
